type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Mob Origins](https://moborigins.ultrusmods.me/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Dyeable Model Color

---

Sets the color of a model, while allowing it to be dyed by the [Set Dyeable Model Color](https://moborigins.ultrusmods.me/en/latest/power_types/dyeable_model_color) action, or the [Consume Dye](https://moborigins.ultrusmods.me/en/latest/power_types/dyeable_model_color) action.

---

### Example
```json
{
    "type": "moborigins:dyeable_model_color",
    "red": 0.0,
    "green": 0.0,
    "blue": 1.0,
    "alpha": 0.9
}
```
Sets the color of a model to blue, and slightly translucent.
type.markdownDescription:
### ⚠️ Requires [Mob Origins](https://moborigins.ultrusmods.me/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Dyeable Model Color

---

Sets the color of a model, while allowing it to be dyed by the [Set Dyeable Model Color](https://moborigins.ultrusmods.me/en/latest/power_types/dyeable_model_color) action, or the [Consume Dye](https://moborigins.ultrusmods.me/en/latest/power_types/dyeable_model_color) action.

---

### Example
```json
{
    "type": "moborigins:dyeable_model_color",
    "red": 0.0,
    "green": 0.0,
    "blue": 1.0,
    "alpha": 0.9
}
```
Sets the color of a model to blue, and slightly translucent.

red.description: The red component of the color.
red.markdownDescription: The red component of the color.

green.description: The green component of the color.
green.markdownDescription: The green component of the color.

blue.description: The blue component of the color.
blue.markdownDescription: The blue component of the color.

alpha.description: The alpha component of the color.
alpha.markdownDescription: The alpha component of the color.
